doc:
Estelle Reiner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estelle_Reiner 0 Estelle Reiner (born Estelle Lebost, June 5, 1914 – October 25, 2008) was an American actress and singer, described by The New York Times as "matriarch of one of the leading families in American comedy". She was the wife of Carl Reiner and the mother of Rob Reiner. Estelle_Reiner ( born Estelle_Lebost , June_5_,_1914 – October_25_,_2008 ) was an_American_actress_and_singer , described by The_New_York_Times as " matriarch of one of the_leading_families in American_comedy_" . She was the_wife of Carl_Reiner and the_mother of Rob_Reiner .
